main event: Three Naval officers observed a brilliant white object moving at terrific speed over Le Lyautey, French Morocco.
interesting points: The object was the size of a bomber and made no sound., The sighting lasted for 3 to 5 seconds., It was described as brilliant white and moving at a high speed., It was observed over Casablanca Bay, Cuba., The observations were recorded under Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force investigation program.
sighted object: brilliant white object in the sky
